meanings.definition: Not following a set pattern or regular procedure
meanings.sent1: Her nonroutines way of doing things always kept us guessing.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonroutines approach to painting created unique masterpieces.
meanings.sent3: His nonroutines method of tying shoelaces made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The nonroutines weather patterns this year have been unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The nonroutines dance moves at the party were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Activities or tasks that are not part of a regular routine
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed adding nonroutines to her daily schedule for excitement.
meanings.sent2: The team building exercise included various nonroutines to challenge the participants.
meanings.sent3: The nonroutines in the scavenger hunt made it more thrilling.
meanings.sent4: His life was full of nonroutines that kept him on his toes.
meanings.sent5: The nonroutines at the event made it stand out from the rest.
